cv: "Lillia Jerde Graduate software engineer 12 Manchester Road Leicester LE1 WS Tel: 0123 345 7890 Mobile: 07123 345 7890 Email: Zachariah32@hi.com PERSONAL SUMMARY AREAS OF EXPERTISE A versatile and professional software graduate with a commitment to and experience of developing innovative and creative software solutions.
